segments.text: Hi ! Dick . Where are you going ? You're in such a hurry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Playground . We're having sports for today's outside class activities . All my classmates have already got there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you going to play ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some of us will play basketball and some volleyball .
segments.speaker: S2
